titleStmt.title: Documents Related to the 1855 Leaves of Grass: Proofs of Reviews and Extracts
titleStmt.author: Nicole Gray
titleStmt.sponsor: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities, University of Nebraska-Lincoln

address.addrLine: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

availability.p: The text encoding and content of this document was created and/or prepared by the Walt Whitman Archive and is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (CC BY 4.0). Any reuse of these materials should credit the Walt Whitman Archive.

sourceDesc.p: Written for The Walt Whitman Archive. First published on the Archive in 2020.

div1.head: Proofs of Reviews and Extracts
div1.p:
Whitman arranged for the printing of an eight-page section devoted to reviews of the 1855 Leaves of Grass. He bound this section into several copies of the 1855 Leaves of Grass. Some copies have partial proofs of these reviews laid in.
Figure. Proof version of "Walt Whitman, A Brooklyn Boy." Charles E. Feinberg Collection, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.
Figure. Proof version of "An English and An American Poet." Charles E. Feinberg Collection, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.
Figure. Proof version of extracts from Putnam's Magazine review. Charles E. Feinberg Collection, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.
